name: A Worthy Skull
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Blood for the Blood God!
text: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a Charge action in this phase

name: Coward!
text: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter begins a Move action adjacent to one of your fighters and ends it adjacent to none of your fighters

name: Draw the Gaze of Khorne
text: Score this immediately if your warband takes two or more enemy fighters out of action in this phase

name: It Begins
text: Score this in an end phase if at least one fighter from each warband is out of action

name: Khorne Cares Not
text: Score this in an end phase if five or more fighters are out of action

name: Khorne's Champion
text: Score this in the third end phase if all fighters except one of your fighters are out of action

name: Let the Blood Flow
text: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a successful Attack action in this phase

name: There is Only Slaughter
text: Score this in an end phase if no fighter is holding an objective

name: Blood Offering
text: Choose a friendly fighter. They suffer 1 damage. Roll two extra attack dice for their first Attack action in the next activation

name: Blood Rain
text: All Attack actions in the next activation have the [Sword] characteristic, even if they would normally have the [Hammer] characteristic

name: Boon of Khorne
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Remove all wound tokens from one friendly fighter

name: Desecrate
text: Remove one objective that you hold from the battlefield

name: Final Blow
text: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent friendly fighter out of action. Their attacker suffers 1 damage

name: Fuelled by Slaughter
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a fighter out of action. A friendly fighter can make an Attack action

name: Insensate
text: The first friendly fighter who suffers any amount of damage in the next activation only suffers one damage

name: Khorne Calls
text: Roll one extra attack dice for your first Attack action in the next activation

name: Rebirth in Blood
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes your last surviving fighter out of action. Roll a defense dice. If you roll a [Shield] or [Critical Hit] remove all wound tokens from them, and place them on a starting hex in your territory

name: Skulls for the Skull Throne!
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Draw up to two power cards

name: Berserk Charge
text: Both [Sword] and [Hammer] symbols are successes when this fighter makes a Charge action

name: Bloodslick
text: +1 Defence

name: Deadly Spin
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] Targets adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each

name: Ever-Advancing
text: Reaction: When this fighter could be driven back during an Attack action (whether or not your opponent chooses to do so), you can instead push them one hex

name: Frenzy
text: Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter makes a Charge action

name: Grisly Trophy
text: When this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point

name: Terrifying Howl
text: Action: Push each adjacent enemy fighter one hex

name: Unstoppable Charge
text: When this fighter makes a Charge action they can move through other fighters, but their move must end in an empty hex

name: Whirlwind of Death
text: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2

name: Wicked Blade
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] If you roll at least one [Critical Hit] this Attack action has Cleave

name: Awe-inspiring
text: Score this immediately if your warband has taken two or more fighters out of action in this phase

name: Cleanse
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold all objectives in enemy territory

name: Consecrated Area
text: Score this in an end phase if  there are no enemy fighters adjacent to your fighters

name: Eternals
text: Score this in the third end phase if none of your fighters are out of action

name: Immovable Object
text: Score this in an end phase if  the same friendly fighter has held the same objective at the end of two consecutive action phases

name: Lightning Strikes
text: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a Charge action made by one of your fighters

name: Seize Ground
text: Score this in an end phase if  you hold an objective in enemy territory

name: Sigmar's Bulwark
text: Score this in an end phase if none of your fighters suffered any damage in the preceding action phase

name: Slayers of Tyrants
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Heroic Guard
text: Choose a friendly fighter and put them on Guard

name: Peal of Thunder
text: Choose any enemy fighter and push them one hex in any direction

name: Righteous Zeal
text: +1 Damage to the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation

name: Sigmarite Wall
text: Choose two adjacent friendly fighters and put them on Guard

name: Stormforged Resistance
text: Friendly fighters cannot be driven back by the first Attack action in the next activation

name: Stormforged Tactics
text:
In the next activation make the following Reaction.
Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Attack action that fails, choose up to two friendly fighters and push them up to one hex each

name: Tireless Assault
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. That fighter can make another Attack action that targets the same fighter

name: Undaunted
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a friendly fighter out of action leaving one surviving friendly fighter on the battlefield. Remove all wound tokens from the surviving fighter

name: Unstoppable Strike
text: The first Attack action in the next activation gains Cleave

name: Valiant Attack
text: Enemy fighters cannot support the target of the first Attack action in the next activation

name: Blessed by Sigmar
text: +1 Wounds

name: Block
text: Action: This fighter and all adjacent friendly fighters go on Guard

name: Brave Strike
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] Roll an extra attack dice if there are no adjacent friendly fighters

name: Fatal Riposte
text: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, roll an attack dice. On a roll of [Hammer] or [Critical Hit] this fighter cannot be driven back and they can make an Attack action. It must target the attacker.

name: Heroic Might
text: This fighter's Attack action gains Cleave

name: Heroic Stride
text: Reaction: After an enemy fighter ends their activation within two hexes of this fighter, you can push this fighter one hex

name: Lightning Blade
text: [Weapon][Hex] 2 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: Lightning Blast
text: When they make a critical hit, this fighter also inflicts 1 damage on enemy fighters adjacent to the target's hex

name: Righteous Strike
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 3 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] Reaction: After this Attack action, if it failed and the target was an enemy leader, make this Attack action again

name: Shield Bash
text: Reaction: During an adjacent fighter's Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be driven back and you can push their attacker one hex

name: Battle Without End
text: Score this in an end phase if two or more friendly fighters returned to the battlefield in the preceding action phase

name: Claim the City
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold every objective

name: Fearless in Death
text: Score this in an end phase if there is only one friendly fighter on the battlefield

name: March of the Dead
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least five) made a Move action in the preceding action phase

name: More Able Bodies
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took two or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Peerless General
text: Score this in the third end phase if you have four or more surviving fighters, and none are Inspired

name: Skills Unforgotten
text: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy fighter out of action

name: The Invigorated Dead
text: Score this in the third end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) are Inspired

name: Undead Swarm
text: Score this in an end phase if each enemy fighter is adjacent to at least two friendly fighters

name: Bone Shrapnel
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. The fighter that took them out of action suffers 1 damage

name: Ceaseless Attacks
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action. Make an Attack action with another friendly fighter

name: Clawing Hands
text: Each friendly fighter that is not on the battlefield is considered to be supporting the first Attack action in the next activation

name: Danse Macabre
text: Any friendly fighters that make a Move action in the next activation can move one additional hex

name: Grasping Hands
text: Reduce the Move characteristic of the first fighter to be activated in the next activation by the number of friendly fighters that are not on the battlefield, to a minimum of 0

name: Restless Dead
text: Place a friendly fighter that was taken out of action (other than the Sepulchral Warden) on a starting hex in your territory

name: Spectral Form
text: Any friendly fighters that make a Move action in the next activation can move through additional fighters, but must end their moves on empty hexes

name: Swift Evasion
text: Choose one friendly fighter and push them up to two hexes. Their new position must be further away from all enemy fighters

name: Terrifying Screams
text: Choose an enemy fighter and push them one hex

name: The Necromancer Commands
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. Make the Attack action again

name: Ancient Commander
text: Action: Choose three other friendly fighters. Make Move actions with these fighters. This does not allow a fighter to move twice in a phase

name: Assumed Command
text: Each friendly fighter that supports this fighter is considered to be two supporting fighters

name: Deathly Charge
text: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage in a phase in which they make a Charge action

name: Fatal Strike
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon]Reaction: Make this Attack action during an Attack action that takes this fighter out of action, before they are removed from the battlefield. It must target their attacker

name: Focused Attack
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] If you roll at least one [Critical Hit] this Attack action has Cleave

name: Frightening Speed
text: +2 Move

name: Grim Cleave
text: This fighter's Attack actions gain Cleave

name: Lethal Lunge
text:
[Hex] 2 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 3
Cleave

name: Remembered Shield
text: This fighter's Defence characteristic changes to [Shield]

name: Undying
text: +1 Wounds

name: ’Ard as Iron
text: Score this in the third end phase if none of your fighters are out of action

name: Biggest an' da Best
text: Score this in an end phase if your leader took an enemy fighter out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Call of the Waaagh!
text: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a Charge action this phase

name: Dead Kunnin'
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter has two more supporting fighters than their target when making an Attack action

name: Dere's More of Us
text: Score this in an end phase if you have more fighters on the battlefield than your opponent

name: Get Da Boss
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Good Scrap
text: Score this in an end phase if three or more fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Punch-up
text: Score this in an end phase if each of your surviving fighters (at least two) made an Attack action against a different enemy fighter in the preceding action phase

name: Too Dumb to Die
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter suffers 3 or more damage in a single attack and is not take out of action

name: ’Avin’ a Good Time
text: Choose a fighter and roll an attack dice. If you roll a [Hammer] or [Critical Hit] the can make an Attack action

name: Brutal But Kunnin'
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action. You can push that fighter up to three hexes

name: Deafening Bellow
text: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to one of your fighters. Push that fighter one hex

name: Gorkamorka's Blessing
text: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage

name: Kunnin' But Brutal
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Move action. That fighter can make an Attack action. You cannot play this during a Charge action

name: Last Lunge
text: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action or ploy that will take a friendly fighter out of action, before removing them from the battlefield. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of [Hammer] or [Critical Hit] make an Attack action with that fighter. It must target the attacker

name: Leadin' By Example
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action made by your leader that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Another friendly fighter that has not already made a Move or Charge action can make a Charge action

name: More Choppin'
text: Roll an extra attack dice for the first Attack action in the next activation

name: Pillage
text: Remove one objective that you hold from the battlefield

name: Scrag 'Em
text: Each friendly fighter that supports the first Attack action in the next activation is considered to be two supporting fighters

name: ’Ard Head
text: When this fighter suffers damage, reduce that damage by 1 to a minimum of 1

name: Aspiring Boss
text: Reaction: During an Attack action by this fighter that targets an enemy leader and fails, you can re-roll one attack dice

name: Brutal Frenzy
text: Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter makes a Charge action

name: Brutal Swing
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] Targets all adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each

name: Crush and Cleave
text: This fighter's Attack actions gain Cleave

name: Dead 'Ard
text: This fighter can only be driven back by a critical hit

name: ’Eadbutt
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] If this Attack action succeeds, the target cannot be activated for the rest of the phase

name: Headlong Rush
text: This fighter's Attack actions gain Knockback 1 in a phase in which they make a Charge action

name: Unkillable
text: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that takes this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a [Shield] or [Critical Hit] they suffer no damage and are not taken out of action, and you discard this upgrade

name: Waaagh!
text: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage in a phase in which they make a Charge action

name: A Claim Retaken
text: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter holds an objective that an enemy fighter held at the beginning of the preceding action phase

name: A Grim Promise
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Ferocious Charge
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with a Charge action

name: For the Ur-gold
text: Score this in an end phase if all your surviving fighters (at least three) are Inspired

name: Fury of the Lodge
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) made a Charge action in the preceding action phase

name: Hoarders
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your fighters and no enemy fighters are holding objectives

name: Oaths Still to Fulfil
text: Score this in the third end phase if none of your fighters are out of action

name: Scion of Grimnir
text: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy fighter out of action

name: Unstoppable Advance
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters are in enemy territory

name: Berserk Fury
text: The first time a friendly fighter suffers damage in the next activation, roll a defence dice. If the result is a [Shield] they suffer no damage

name: Indomitable
text: The first time a friendly fighter suffers damage in the next activation, they only suffer 1 damage

name: Living Wall
text: Choose two friendly fighters and push each of them up to one hex. They must end up adjacent to one another

name: Oathsworn
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. That fighter can make another Attack action that targets the same fighter

name: Piercing Stare
text: Choose an enemy fighter. They cannot make an Attack action or a Charge action in the next activation

name: Slaying Blow
text: If the first Attack action in the next activation is a critical hit, double its Damage characteristic

name: The Earth Shakes
text: Choose a fighter and push them one hex

name: Treasure-lust
text: Choose a friendly fighter and push them up to three hexes. They must end up holding an objective

name: Ur-gold Boon
text: Choose a friendly fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of [Shield] or [Critical Hit] remove up to two wound tokens from them. Otherwise remove one wound token from them

name: We Shall Not Be Moved
text: Friendly fighters holding objectives cannot be driven back by the first Attack action in the next activation

name: Activated Runes
text: Each time this fighter make an Attack action, you can re-roll one dice

name: Brute Strength
text: This fighter's Attack actions gain Knockback 1

name: Defiant Strike
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] Reaction: During an Attack action that succeeds against this fighter, this fighter cannot be driven back and makes this Attack action. It must target the attacker.

name: Flurry of Blows
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 2[/Weapon]

name: Great Swing
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] Targets all adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each

name: Grimnir's Blessing
text: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that would take this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a [Shield] the damage suffered by this fighter is ignored

name: Grimnir's Fortitude
text: +1 Defence

name: Grimnir's Speed
text: +2 Move

name: Returning Axe
text: [Weapon][Hex] 3 [Sword] 2 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] On a critical hit this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: War Song
text: This fighter is considered to be two supporting fighters when they support, rather than one

name: Arm's Length
text: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action while they are adjacent to none of your fighters

name: Brilliant, Brilliant!
text: Score this in an end phase if you scored two or more other objective cards in the preceding action phase

name: Feast-feast
text: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters have been taken out of action

name: Honed Survival Instincts
text: Score this in an end phase if no friendly fighter was taken out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Leading from the Back
text: Score this in the third end phase if your leader is in your territory and not adjacent to an enemy

name: Live to Fight Another Day
text: Score this in the third end phase if the only surviving friendly fighter is your leader

name: Lives are Cheap
text: Score this in an end phase if two or more friendly fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Numberless Swarm
text: Score this in the third end phase if there are five friendly fighters on the battlefield

name: Skritch is the Greatest, Yes-yes
text: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy fighter out of action

name: Aversion to Death
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. Push up to two friendly fighters one hex each

name: Frenzied Stabbing
text: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage

name: Heightened Caution
text: Roll an extra defence dice for the first friendly fighter to be targeted by an Attack action in the next activation

name: Momentary Boldness
text: Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to two or more friendly fighters. That fighter makes a Charge action

name: Musk of Fear
text: Choose a friendly fighter and put them on Guard

name: Nervous Scrabbling
text: Choose a friendly fighter. They switch places with any adjacent fighter

name: Scratching in the Shadows
text: Choose an enemy fighter and push them one hex

name: Skaven Courage
text: Play this if there are at least three friendly fighters adjacent to the same enemy fighter. One of those friendly fighters can make an Attack action

name: Sudden Skittering
text: Double the Move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a Move action in the next activation. They may not make a Charge action. Once they have moved, they cannot be activated again this phase

name: There Are Always More
text: Choose one friendly fighter that is out of action (other than Skritch or Krrk). Remove all wound tokens from them and place them on any starting hex

name: Black Hunger
text: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 have +1 Damage, and target all adjacent fighters (friend and foe) - roll for each. Fighters do not provide support for Attack actions against friendly models (in attack or defence)

name: Bodyguard for a Price
text: If Skritch is adjacent to this fighter, Skritch is on Guard (even if Skritch has made a Charge action this phase)

name: Expendable
text: Reaction: During an Attack action that will cause any damage to this fighter, you can remove them from the battlefield and deal 1 damage to their attacker

name: Festering Blade
text: On a critical hit, this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +2 Damage

name: Flee!
text: Action: This fighter and one adjacent friendly fighter can make a Move action. Both fighters must end their move further away from all enemy fighters

name: Skitter-scurry
text: Reaction: After any action that this fighter makes, you can push this fighter one hex

name: Sneaky Stab-stab
text: You can push this fighter one hex before they take an Attack action, though not when this fighter takes a Charge action

name: Swarm of Rats
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] Targets all adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each

name: Throwing Stars
text: [Weapon][Hex] 3 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1[/Weapon]

name: Whirling Halberd
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] Targets all adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each

name: All the Better to Slay Them
text: Score this immediately if all friendly fighters (at least three) are adjacent to a different enemy fighter

name: Bane of Champions
text: Score this immediately if Riptooth takes an enemy leader out of action

name: Bloody Annihilation
text: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters have been taken out of action

name: Khorne Sees Us
text: Score this immediately if your warband takes two or more enemy fighters out of action in a phase

name: Kill! Kill Again!
text: Score this in an end phase if at least two fighters from each warband are out of action

name: No Escape
text: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a Charge action this phase

name: Rivers of Blood
text: Score this in an end phase if all surviving fighters (at least four) are wounded

name: Save the Best
text: Score this in an end phase if an enemy leader is the only surviving enemy fighter

name: Show of Strength
text: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy fighter out of action

name: Blood Frenzy
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a fighter out of action. Roll one extra attack dice for the first Attack action in the next activation. Both [Hammer] and [Sword] are successes for that Attack action

name: Bloodslick Ground
text: In the next activation, enemy fighters have -2 Move

name: Bloody Retribution
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. A friendly fighter adjacent to the attacker makes an Attack action against that fighter

name: Continue the Slaughter
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a fighter out of action. The first Attack action in the next activation has +1 Damage

name: Daemonic Resilience
text: The first friendly fighter who suffers any amount of damage in the next activation only suffers 1 damage

name: Fountain of Gore
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a fighter out of action. All friendly fighters have +1 Defence in the next activation

name: Furious Inspiration
text: Choose a friendly fighter. The become Inspired

name: Glory to Khorne
text: Roll one extra attack dice for the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation

name: Horrifying Howl
text: Choose an enemy fighter that is adjacent to a friendly fighter and push them up to two hexes

name: To the Victor, the Spoils
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 3 or more out of action. Draw three power cards

name: Brutal Charge
text: Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter makes a Charge action

name: Daemonic Maw
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 2 [Damage] 3[/Weapon] If this Attack action succeeds, remove one wound token from this fighter

name: Furious Charge
text: When this fighter makes a Charge action both [Hammer] and [Sword] are successes

name: No Respite
text: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that will take this fighter out of action, you can make an Attack action with them

name: Predatory Leap
text: When this fighter makes a Charge action they can move through other fighters, but their move must end in an empty hex

name: Rage-fuelled Attacks
text: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage

name: Shake About
text: This fighter's successful Attack actions with a Range of 1 can push the target one hex (instead of driving them back) in addition to inflicting damage

name: Trophy Hunter
text: When this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point

name: Unshakeable
text: Reaction: During an Attack action that could drive this fighter back (whether or not your opponent chooses to do so), you can instead push them one hex

name: Wrathful Blows
text: All of this fighter's Attack actions have +1 Dice

name: Behead the Beast
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Brave but Cautious
text: Score this in an end phase if you have at least one surviving fighter and none of your fighters suffered any damage in the preceding action phase

name: Close with the Enemy
text: Score this in an end phase if three friendly fighters are adjacent to enemy fighters

name: Eternal Supremacy
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold three of more objectives

name: Lightning Advance
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least two) are in enemy territory

name: Meticulous Annihilation
text: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters have been taken out of action

name: Punishing Volleys
text: Score this in an end phase if you made at least three successful Boltstorm Pistol or Overcharged Boltstorm Pistol Attack actions in the preceding action phase

name: Ranger Strike
text: Score this immediately if your warband has taken two or more fighters out of action in this phase

name: Sigmar's Finest
text: Score this in an end phase if your surviving fighters (at least one) are outnumbered by surviving enemy fighters by at least three to one

name: Fearsome Roar
text: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter. Push them one hex

name: Firm Footing
text: Roll an extra defence dice for friendly fighters holding objectives in the next activation

name: Lightning Blow
text: The first Attack action in the next activation has +1 Damage

name: Lightning Stride
text: Double the Move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a Move action in the next activation. They may not make a Charge action. Once they have moved, they cannot be activated again this phase

name: Patient Defence
text: The first friendly fighter to be targeted by an Attack action in the next activation has +1 Defence

name: Rangers, Advance
text: Choose two friendly fighters and push them one hex

name: Rapid Volley
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Boltstorm Pistol or Overcharged Boltstorm Pistol Attack action. That fighter can make another Boltstorm Pistol or Overcharged Boltstorm Pistol Attack action that targets the same fighter

name: Retribution
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that damages a friendly fighter. That fighter can make an Attack action that must target the attacker

name: Steady Volley
text: The first friendly fighter to make a Boltstorm Pistol or Overcharged Bolstorm Pistol Attack action in the next activation can be pushed one hex before they do so

name: Warning Cry
text: Choose a friendly fighter and put them on Guard

name: Aetheric Step
text: This fighter can move through other fighters during a Move action, but must end their move in an empty hex

name: Covering Fire
text: This fighter can support an adjacent friendly fighter targeted by an Attack action, even if this fighter is not adjacent to the attacker

name: Flashing Handaxe
text:
[Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 3
Cleave

name: Furious Blow
text: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter and has failed, this fighter cannot be driven back and can make an Attack action. It must target the attacker

name: Lone Warrior
text: Rolls of [Single Support] made for this fighter when they are targeted by an Attack action also count as successes when they are adjacent to no friendly fighters

name: Overcharged Boltstorm Pistol
text:
[Hex] 3 [Hammer] 3 [Damage] 1
Cleave

name: Sharp Eyes
text: This fighter's Attack actions gain Cleave

text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] Targets all adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each

text: +2 Move

Cleave

name: Accept Inevitability
text: Score this in the third end phase if all of your fighters are out of action

name: Advancing Strike
text: Score this immediately when your warband takes an enemy fighter standing in enemy territory out of action

name: Alone in the Darkness
text: Score this in an end phase if there are no adjacent fighters on the battlefield

name: Annihilation
text: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters have been taken out of action

name: Assassinate
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Balance of Power
text: Score this immediately when making an Attack action if both the attacker and the target have two supporting fighters

name: Blooded
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) have at least one wound token

name: Bloodless
text: Score this in an end phase if no fighter suffered any damage in the preceding action phase

name: Brawl
text: Score this in an end phase if all friendly fighters (at least three) are adjacent to enemy fighters

name: Butchery
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband took three or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase

name: Change of Tactics
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter on Guard makes a Charge action

name: Chosen Champion
text: Score this in an end phase if a surviving friendly fighter has three or more upgrades

name: Complete Victory
text: Score this in the third end phase if none of your fighters are out of action

name: Concerted Attack
text: Score this immediately if three or more friendly fighters made an Attack action against the same enemy fighter in this phase

name: Conquest
text: Score this in the third end phase if all of your surviving fighters are in your opponent's territory

name: Contained
text: Score this in the third end phase if all surviving enemy fighters are in their territory

name: Cover Ground
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a Move action of six or more hexes

name: Crushing Force
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a successful attack that deals at least twice as much damage as is needed to take their target out of action

name: Dauntless
text: Score this in an end phase if your fighters are outnumbered by at least three to one

name: Defensive Strike
text: Score this immediately when your warband takes an enemy fighter standing in your territory out of action

name: Denial
text: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory

name: Determined Defender
text: Score this in an end phase if the same friendly fighter has held the same objective at the end of two consecutive action phases

name: Divide and Conquer
text: Score this is an end phase if each player has at least one fighter in their own territory and at least one fighter in enemy territory

name: Endless Slaughter
text: Score this in the third end phase if five or more enemy fighters are out of action

name: Escalation
text: Score this in an end phase if three or more upgrade cards were played in the preceding action phase

name: Fearless
text: Score this in an end phase if there are at least three enemy fighters adjacent to the same friendly fighter

name: Flawless Strategy
text: Score this in an end phase if you scored two or more other objective cards in this phase

name: Geared for War
text: Score this in an end phase if each of your surviving fighters (at least three) has at least one upgrade

name: Heroes All
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) are Inspired

name: Heroic Feat
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action succeeds when their target has two or more supporting fighters more then the attacker

name: Hold Objective 1
text: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 1

name: Hold Objective 2
text: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 2

name: Hold Objective 3
text: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 3

name: Hold Objective 4
text: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 4

name: Hold Objective 5
text: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 5

name: Honest Opponent
text: Score this in an end phase if you played no ploy cards during the preceding action phase

name: Killing Ground
text: Score this in an end phase if at least one fighter was taken out of action in the preceding action phase in enemy territory, in your territory and in no one's territory

name: Making a Statement
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold all objectives (at least one) in your opponent's territory

name: Massive Assault
text: Score this immediately if your fighters deal 7 or more damage in an action phase (damage in excess of a fighter's Wounds characteristic is included)

name: Master of War
text: Score this in an end phase if you scored an objective card, played a ploy card and played an upgrade card in this round

name: Masterstroke
text: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by an Attack action made as a Reaction by your warband or a Reaction made by your warband that causes damage

name: Miraculous Escape
text: Score this immediately if one of your fighters is the target of an enemy Attack action with a Dice characteristic of 3 or more that fails

name: Multiple Fronts
text: Score this in an end phase if your warband dealt damage to three or more enemy fighters in the preceding action phase

name: No More Tricks
text: Score this in an end phase if you have no power cards in your hand

name: No Remorse
text: Score this immediately if one of your fighters takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action with a Damage characteristic greater than the target's Wounds characteristic

name: Our Only Way Out
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives

name: Overextended
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold every objective

name: Perfect Planning
text: Score this in an end phase if none of your fighters made a Move action in the preceding action phase

name: Plant a Standard
text: Score this in an end phase if your leader is holding an objective in enemy territory

name: Ploymaster
text: Score this in an end phase if you played three or more ploys in the preceding action phase

name: Poised to Strike
text: Score this in an end phase if at least three friendly fighters are adjacent to the same enemy fighter

name: Precise Use of Force
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a successful Attack action that deals exactly enough damage to take their target out of action

name: Pure Carnage
text: Score this in the third end phase if seven or more fighters are out of action

name: Ready for a Challenge
text: Score this in an end phase if all remaining enemy fighters (at least three) have an upgrade

name: Reaper
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's attack takes two or more enemy fighters out of action

name: Scent of Victory
text: Score this in an end phase if all surviving enemy fighters (at least three) have at least one wound token

name: Skirting Danger
text: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least two) are on edge hexes

name: Stymied
text: Score this in an end phase if your opponent played no power cards in the preceding action phase

name: Superior Tactician
text: Score this in the third end phase if you have scored six or more other objective cards

name: Supremacy
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives

name: Swift Advance
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters are in enemy territory

name: Tactical Genius 1-3
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 1, 2 and 3

name: Tactical Genius 3-5
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 3, 4 and 5

name: Tactical Supremacy 1-2
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 1 and 2

name: Tactical Supremacy 3-4
text: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 3 and 4

name: The Bigger They Are
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action that had a Damage characteristic of 1

name: The Harvest Begins
text: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes an Attack action that damages three or more enemy fighters

name: Total Annihilation
text: Score this in the first or second end phase if all enemy fighters have been taken out of action

name: Trapped
text: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter takes damage from a friendly fighter's Attack action because they cannot be driven back

name: Twilight Conqueror
text: Score this in an end phase if all of your surviving fighters (at least three) are neither in your territory nor enemy territory

name: Unbroken Wall
text: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) are in a single group with each friendly fighter adjacent to another friendly fighter

name: Unstoppable
text: Score this immediately if one of your fighters makes a successful Attack action against an enemy fighter on Guard

name: Victorious Duel
text: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy leader out of action

name: Victory After Victory
text: Score this in an end phase if you scored three or more other objective cards in this round

name: War of Attrition
text: Score this in an end phase if the same number of fighters (at least one) from each warband are out of action

name: Anticipation
text: Play this card after the final activation in an action phase. Name an objective card. If an opponent scores that objective in the end phase, score a glory point

name: Blinding Flash
text: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action with a Range of 3 or greater (before any dice are rolled). The Attacks characteristic of that Attack action is changed to [Sword] 1

name: Confused Priorities
text: Switch two objectives that are currently being held

name: Confusion
text: Choose two fighters that are adjacent to each other and switch them

name: Cruel Taunt
text: Choose an enemy fighter and roll an attack dice. On a roll of [Hammer] or [Critical Hit] they are no longer Inspired, and cannot be Inspired this game

name: Curious Inversion
text: For the first Attack action in the next activation, [Hammer] characteristics become [Sword] characteristics and vice versa, and [Dodge] characteristics become [Shield] characteristics and vice versa

name: Darkness Descends
text: The first Attack action in the next activation has a Range of 1

name: Daylight Robbery
text: Roll an attack dice. If you roll a [Hammer] or [Critical Hit] take one of your opponent's unspent glory points

name: Death Throes
text: Reaction: Play this card during an Attack action or ploy that will take a friendly fighter out of action. Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to the target. They suffer 1 damage

name: Desperate Gambit
text: When resolving the first Attack action in the next activation, you and your opponent roll off. The winner chooses whether the Attack action fails or succeeds

name: Distraction
text: Choose an enemy fighter and push them one hex

name: Dual Strike
text: One fighter supporting the first Attack action in the next activation is considered to be two supporting fighters

name: Duel of Wits
text: Reaction: Play this when an opponent plays a ploy. Draw two power cards

name: Earthquake
text: Push all fighters one hex. You must push them all in the same direction. Any that cannot be pushed this way are not pushed

name: Ephemeral Shield
text: The first friendly fighter to be targeted by an Attack action in the next activation has +1 Defence

name: Flickering Step
text: Roll eight dice. Choose a friendly fighter and push them up to a number of hexes equal to the number of [Critical Hit] rolled

name: Forceful Denial
text: Reaction: Play this when an opponent plays a ploy. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of [Shield] or [Critical Hit] that ploy has no effect

name: Fortify
text: Friendly fighters holding objectives have +1 Defence for the next activation

name: Frozen in Time
text: Choose an enemy fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of [Shield] or [Critical Hit] that fighter cannot make any actions or be damaged in this phase

name: Fuelled by Fury
text: You can re-roll any attack dice for the first friendly fighter's Attack action in the next activation

name: Grapple
text: Reaction: Play this after an adjacent enemy fighter makes an Attack action that drives a friendly fighter back. Push the attacker into the hex the friendly fighter was driven back from

name: Great Concussion
text: Choose a hex on the battlefield, then push all fighters one hex (in whichever order you choose). This push must move them away from the chosen hex. If there is no hex you could push a fighter into, do not push them

name: Healing Potion
text: Choose a friendly fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of [Shield] or [Critical Hit] remove up to two wound tokens from them. Otherwise remove one wound token from them

name: Hidden Paths
text: Choose a friendly fighter that hasn't made a Move action this phase and is on any edge hex. Place them on any other edge hex. They are considered to have made a Move action

name: Illusory Fighter
text: Choose one of your fighters on the battlefield. Place them on a starting hex in your territory

name: Improvisation
text: Discard all power cards in your hand and draw three power cards

name: Inspiration Strikes
text: Choose a friendly fighter. They become Inspired

name: Invisible Walls
text: All fighters' Move characteristics are reduced to 1 for the next activation

name: Last Chance
text: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that would take a friendly fighter out of action. Roll a defence dice. If the result would not normally be a success for this fighter, ignore the damage from that Attack action on this fighter

name: Legacy
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a friendly fighter out of action. Choose one of their universal upgrades and give it to an adjacent friendly fighter

name: Lethal Strike
text: If the first Attack action in the next activation is a critical hit, double its Damage characteristic for that Attack action

name: Mighty Swing
text: Your first Attack action with a Range characteristic of 1 in the next activation targets all adjacent enemy fighters. Roll for each

name: Mischievous Spirits
text: Taking it in turns with your opponent(s), starting with you and going clockwise, move each objective one hex. Objectives cannot be moved into a hex that already contains an objective

name: Misdirection
text: Reaction: Play this when a friendly fighter is chosen by a ploy. Choose another friendly fighter that could be chosen by that ploy. That fighter is chosen instead

name: Momentary Madness
text: Choose an enemy fighter and roll an attack dice. If you roll a [Hammer] or [Critical Hit] make an Attack action with them as if they were a friendly fighter. Fighters do not provide support for this Attack action (in attack or defence)

name: My Turn
text: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action or ploy that damage a friendly fighter. Push them up to one hex and make an Attack action with them

name: No Time
text: No more power cards can be played until after the next activation

name: On Your Feet
text: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action or ploy that would take a friendly fighter out of action, when there is a friendly fighter adjacent to them. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of [Shield] or [Critical Hit] the fighter does not suffer damage and is not taken out of action

name: Parry
text: The first time one of your fighters is targeted in the next activation, roll an extra defence dice. When counting your successes, ignore one of the defence dice

name: Quick Thinker
text: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action. Make a Move action with a friendly fighter who has not already made a Move action in this phase

name: Ready for Action
text: Reaction: Play this after you upgrade a fighter in an action phase. They can make a Move or Attack action

name: Rebound
text: Reaction: Play this during an enemy Attack action that would succeed. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of [Dodge] or [Critical Hit] the attacker suffers the damage, rather than the target, and neither fighter is driven back

name: Reflected Injury
text: Choose a friendly fighter with at least one wound token, and an adjacent enemy fighter. The enemy fighter suffers 1 damage

name: Rethink Strategy
text: Discard any number of objective cards and draw that number of objective cards

name: Sacrificial Pawn
text: Choose a friendly fighter. If they are taken out of action in the next activation, you gain a glory point

name: Scavenge
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent enemy fighter with an upgrade out of action. Gain an additional glory point

name: Second Wind
text: Choose a friendly fighter that made a Charge action this phase. In the next activation, they can be activated as if they had Moved rather than Charged

name: Shardfall
text: Place a Shardfall token in an unoccupied hex. That hex is blocked until the end of the phase

name: Shardgale
text: All fighters suffer 1 damage

name: Shattering Terrain
text: Any fighters that make a Move action, are pushed or are driven back in the next activation suffer 1 damage

name: Shattershard
text: Choose an enemy fighter, and choose one of their upgrades. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of [Hammer] or [Critical Hit] that upgrade is discarded

name: Shifting Shards
text: Move an unheld objective one hex. You cannot move it into a hex that already contains an objective

name: Sidestep
text: Choose a friendly fighter and push them one hex

name: Spectral Wings
text: The first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation has +2 Move

name: Spoils of Battle
text: Play an upgrade card. This doesn't cost a glory point

name: Sprint
text: Double the move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a Move action in the next activation. They may not make a Charge action. Once they have moved, they cannot be activated again in this phase

name: Stumble
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action drives an enemy fighter back. They are driven back an additional hex in the same direction

name: Tainted Vitality
text: Remove one wound token from each fighter who has at least one wound token

name: Tantalising Prize
text: The first friendly fighter to take a Move action in the next activation can move up to an additional two hexes if they end their move on an objective

name: Teamwork
text: Reaction: Play this card during a friendly fighter's Attack action, before rolling any dice. Push another friendly fighter one hex

name: Time Trap
text: Choose a fighter. They can take an action. Skip your next activation (you cannot play this card after your fourth activation)

name: Trap
text: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action that drives an enemy fighter back. The enemy fighter suffers 1 damage

name: Triumphant Roar
text: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. You can push each enemy fighter adjacent to the friendly fighter one hex

name: Trust to Luck
text: Discard any number of power cards and draw up to that number of power cards from your deck

name: Twist the Knife
text: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action that has a Range of 1 and will succeed. It has +1 Damage for that Attack action

name: A Destiny to Meet
text: If this fighter is not out of action at the end of the third action phase, gain 1 additional glory point

name: Acrobatic
text: If this fighter has a [Dodge] Defence characteristic or has a [Shield] Defence characteristic but is on Guard, roll an extra defence dice when they are the target of an Attack action

name: Army of One
text: If this fighter is the last friendly fighter on the battlefield, they have +1 Defence and all of their Attack actions have +1 Dice

name: Awakened Weapon
text: You can re-roll one attack dice each time this fighter makes an Attack action

name: Blessed Armour
text: When you roll a [Critical Hit] for this fighter when they are targeted by an Attack action, remove one wound token from them before any damage is dealt

name: Concealed Weapon
text: On a critical hit, this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 have +2 Damage

name: Coordinated Attack
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] When making this Attack action, roll an extra attack dice for each other friendly fighter adjacent to the target

name: Cunning Duellist
text: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action that succeeds against an adjacent enemy fighter, instead of driving the target back you can switch the two fighters' places

name: Cursed Artefact
text: +1 Defense, -1 Wounds

name: Daemonic Weapon
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 3[/Weapon] Each time this fighter makes this Attack action, they first suffer 1 damage

name: Dark Darts
text:
[Hex] 3 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1
Cleave

name: Deathly Fortune
text: -2 Move, +2 Wounds

name: Disengage
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] Reaction: After this Attack action, if it is successful, you can push this fighter one hex

name: Ethereal Shield
text: This fighter's Defence characteristic changes to [Shield]

name: Flickering Image
text: Reaction: After an Attack action made by this fighter that scores a critical hit, you can push them up to two hexes

name: Ghostblade
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] When rolling defence dice, only rolls of Crit are successes for the target of this Attack action. This Attack action can never cause more than 1 damage to a target

name: Great Fortitude
text: +1 Wounds

name: Great Speed
text: +1 Move

name: Great Strength
text: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2

name: Headlong Charge
text: When this fighter makes a Charge action, increase their Move characteristic by 1 until the end of the activation

name: Helpful Whispers
text: If this fighter has no adjacent friendly fighters, rolls of [Single Support] are a success when they make an Attack action

name: Heroslayer
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 1 [Damage] 4[/Weapon]

name: Incredible Strength
text: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2

name: Katophrane's Belt [Relic]
text:
If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities:
2+ Relics: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter, re-roll the defence dice
3+ Relics: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action, re-roll the attack dice
4+ Relics: Reaction: After this fighter's action, draw two power cards
6+ Relics: Action: Gain 4 glory points

name: Katophrane's Boots [Relic]
text:
If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities:
2+ Relics: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter, re-roll the defence dice
3+ Relics: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action, re-roll the attack dice
4+ Relics: Reaction: After this fighter's action, draw two power cards
6+ Relics: Action: Gain 4 glory points

name: Katophrane's Gloves [Relic]
text:
If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities:
2+ Relics: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter, re-roll the defence dice
3+ Relics: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action, re-roll the attack dice
4+ Relics: Reaction: After this fighter's action, draw two power cards
6+ Relics: Action: Gain 4 glory points

name: Katophrane's Hood [Relic]
text:
If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities:
2+ Relics: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter, re-roll the defence dice
3+ Relics: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action, re-roll the attack dice
4+ Relics: Reaction: After this fighter's action, draw two power cards
6+ Relics: Action: Gain 4 glory points

name: Katophrane's Locket [Relic]
text:
If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities:
2+ Relics: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter, re-roll the defence dice
3+ Relics: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action, re-roll the attack dice
4+ Relics: Reaction: After this fighter's action, draw two power cards
6+ Relics: Action: Gain 4 glory points

name: Katophrane's Plate [Relic]
text:
If this fighter has two or more Katophrane Relics, they gain the following (cumulative) abilities:
2+ Relics: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter, re-roll the defence dice
3+ Relics: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action, re-roll the attack dice
4+ Relics: Reaction: After this fighter's action, draw two power cards
6+ Relics: Action: Gain 4 glory points

name: Legendary Swiftness
text: +1 Move

name: Light Armour
text: Rolls of [Critical Hit] on a defence dice are no longer a success for this fighter. Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter make an Attack action

name: Light-footed
text: Reaction: During an Attack action that could drive this fighter back (whether or not your opponent chose to), you can instead push them one hex

name: Low Blow
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] Both [Sword]and [Hammer] symbols are successes for this Attack action

name: Opportunist
text: Reaction: After a failed Attack action that targets this fighter, you can push them one hex

name: Regeneration
text: At the beginning of each action phase, remove up to one wound token from this fighter

name: Second-in-command
text: If your warband's leader is out of action, this fighter is considered to be a leader. While this fighter is on the battlefield, opponents cannot score objectives for having taken your leader out of action

name: Shadeglass Axe
text:
[Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage
[Weapon][Hex] 3 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] After a fighter makes this Attack action, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: Shadeglass Dagger
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 3[/Weapon] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: Shadeglass Darts
text: [Weapon][Hex] 3 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: Shadeglass Hammer
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 3[/Weapon] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: Shadeglass Spear
text: [Weapon][Hex] 2 [Hammer] 2 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: Shadeglass Sword
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 3 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] When this Attack action is successful, discard this upgrade. On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage

name: Shadestep
text: This fighter can move through other fighters during a Move action, but must end their move in an empty hex

name: Shardcaller
text: At the beginning of each action phase, you can switch an objective held by this fighter with any other objective

name: Shifting Image
text: Reaction: After any Attack action in which you roll a [Critical Hit] for this fighter (with an attack or defence dice), you can push this fighter one hex

name: Sixth Sense
text: Your opponent can never consider a [Double Support] as a success for Attack actions that target this fighter

name: Solid Stance
text: This fighter can only be driven back by a critical hit

name: Soultrap
text: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that takes this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a [Shield] or [Critical Hit] they suffer no damage and are not taken out of action, and you discard this upgrade

name: Sprinter
text: +1 Move

name: Superior Agility
text: Reaction: During an Attack action that could drive this fighter back (whether or not your opponent chose to), you can instead push them one hex

name: Swift Strike
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Sword] 3 [Damage] 1[/Weapon] Reaction: Before making this Attack action, push this fighter one hex

name: Tethered Spirit
text: Reaction: During an Attack action or ploy that takes this fighter out of action, roll a defence dice. If you roll a [Shield] or [Critical Hit] place them on any starting hex in your territory, ignore the damage and discard this upgrade. If you cannot, they are taken out of action

name: The Blazing Key
text: If this fighter is holding objective 3 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points

name: The Dazzling Key
text: If this fighter is holding objective 4 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points

name: The Formless Key
text: If this fighter is holding an objective in the third end phase, score 1 glory point

name: The Fractured Key
text: If this fighter is holding objective 5 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points

name: The Hallowed Key
text: If this fighter is holding objective 1 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points

name: The Shadowed Key
text: If this fighter is holding objective 2 in the third end phase, score 2 glory points

name: Total Offence
text: You can roll two additional attack dice when this fighter takes an Attack action, though not when this fighter takes a Charge action. If you do so, this fighter cannot be activated again this phase

name: Trickster's Charm
text: If this fighter is on the battlefield, you can play a single ploy card at the beginning of each action phase

name: Trusted Defender
text: You can re-roll one defence dice for this fighter when they are the target of an Attack action

name: Unparalleled Strike
text: [Weapon][Hex] 1 [Hammer] 1 [Damage] 2[/Weapon] Rolls of [Hammer] are considered to be rolls of [Critical Hit] for this Attack action

name: Vampiric Weapon
text: When this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, remove one wound token from this fighter

name: War Cry
text: When this fighter makes a Charge action, their Attack actions gain Knockback 1 for that activation

name: Zealous Defender
text: This fighter is considered to have an additional supporting fighter while they are holding an objective
